trans-unit.source: {7>Do not copy and paste them from the source text.<7}
trans-unit.target: {7>Do not copy and paste them from the source text.<7}

trans-unit.source: Currently, we cannot manage placeables and untranslatable parts.
trans-unit.target: Currently, we cannot manage placeables and untranslatable parts.

trans-unit.source: We plan to develop such functionality in one of our next releases.
trans-unit.target: We plan to develop such functionality in one of our next releases.

trans-unit.source: Once your translation has been entered or the pre-translated segment edited, click on the {1>Translated <1}{2>button to <2}{3>confirm your translation and move to the next segment<3}.
trans-unit.target: Once your translation has been entered or the pre-translated segment edited, click on the {1>Translated <1}{2>button to <2}{3>confirm your translation and move to the next segment<3}.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the {4>keyboard shortcut<4}{5> Ctrl+Enter<5}.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can use the {4>keyboard shortcut<4}{5> Ctrl+Enter<5}.

trans-unit.source: {1>If you want to <1}{2>confirm the translation of the current segment and go to the next untranslated segment<2}, click on the {3>T+>> <3}{4>button or use the keyboard shortcut <4}{5>CTRL+SHIFT+Enter<5}.
trans-unit.target: {1>If you want to <1}{2>confirm the translation of the current segment and go to the next untranslated segment<2}, click on the {3>T+>> <3}{4>button or use the keyboard shortcut <4}{5>CTRL+SHIFT+Enter<5}.

trans-unit.source: The segment status bar colour will change from white to blue.
trans-unit.target: The segment status bar colour will change from white to blue.

trans-unit.source: In this way you {1>save the segment and update the translation memory<1}.
trans-unit.target: In this way you {1>save the segment and update the translation memory<1}.

trans-unit.source: If you do not click on the {2>Translated <2}button, and move manually on to the next (or press CTRL+Down) or to the previous (or press CTRL+Up) segment, your translation will be saved in the file but {3>the translation memory will not be updated<3}.
trans-unit.target: If you do not click on the {2>Translated <2}button, and move manually on to the next (or press CTRL+Down) or to the previous (or press CTRL+Up) segment, your translation will be saved in the file but {3>the translation memory will not be updated<3}.

trans-unit.source: The bar to the right of each segment indicates its {1>status <1}using colours.
trans-unit.target: The bar to the right of each segment indicates its {1>status <1}using colours.

trans-unit.source: Click on it to display the following options and to set/change the {2>status of a segment<2}:
trans-unit.target: Click on it to display the following options and to set/change the {2>status of a segment<2}:

trans-unit.source: When you approve a segment during translation, MateCat {1>automatically populates <1}{2>your translation with <2}{3>all segments having the same source <3}within the same project.
trans-unit.target: When you approve a segment during translation, MateCat {1>automatically populates <1}{2>your translation with <2}{3>all segments having the same source <3}within the same project.

trans-unit.source: They will be labelled as {1>AUTOPROPAGATED <1}as shown in the screenshot below
trans-unit.target: They will be labelled as {1>AUTOPROPAGATED <1}as shown in the screenshot below

trans-unit.source: Your translation {1>will appear in all segments having the same source <1}but the status of the segments will remain “{2>untranslated<2}“.
trans-unit.target: Your translation {1>will appear in all segments having the same source <1}but the status of the segments will remain “{2>untranslated<2}“.

trans-unit.source: You must approve them manually by clicking on the {3>Translated <3}button (or use the CTRL+Enter shortcut).
trans-unit.target: You must approve them manually by clicking on the {3>Translated <3}button (or use the CTRL+Enter shortcut).

trans-unit.source: Concordance searching allows you to search the translation memory, both public and private, if any, for a particular word, word sequence or phrase.
trans-unit.target: Concordance searching allows you to search the translation memory, both public and private, if any, for a particular word, word sequence or phrase.

trans-unit.source: The search will find and display all previously translated segments in the {1>private TM<1} {2>Key<2} associated with the project and in the public TM containing that word, those words or that phrase.
trans-unit.target: The search will find and display all previously translated segments in the {1>private TM<1} {2>Key<2} associated with the project and in the public TM containing that word, those words or that phrase.

trans-unit.source: You can perform a concordance search by entering or pasting the text to check in the Concordance tab on the {1>Translation Editor<1} page.
trans-unit.target: You can perform a concordance search by entering or pasting the text to check in the Concordance tab on the {1>Translation Editor<1} page.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can select the words you would like to check and use the following {2>shortcuts<2}{3> which will automatically open up the Concordance tab:<3}
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can select the words you would like to check and use the following {2>shortcuts<2}{3> which will automatically open up the Concordance tab:<3}

trans-unit.source: The project contains one QA error.
trans-unit.target: The project contains one QA error.

trans-unit.source: {1>If you have uploaded <1}{2>more than one file <2}for translation {3>in the same project<3}, you can {4>click on the job name at the top of the page to display a list of the files<4}.
trans-unit.target: {1>If you have uploaded <1}{2>more than one file <2}for translation {3>in the same project<3}, you can {4>click on the job name at the top of the page to display a list of the files<4}.

trans-unit.source: Clicking on the file name, you will be redirected to the beginning of that file.
trans-unit.target: Clicking on the file name, you will be redirected to the beginning of that file.

trans-unit.source: Click on {1>Go to current segment <1}to display the segment you are working on.
trans-unit.target: Click on {1>Go to current segment <1}to display the segment you are working on.

trans-unit.source: At the top right of the MateCat window, you will see an icon which warns of any po-tential QA errors in the translation.
trans-unit.target: At the top right of the MateCat window, you will see an icon which warns of any po-tential QA errors in the translation.

trans-unit.source: The warning sign contains a red circle indicating how many errors have been found in the project.
trans-unit.target: The warning sign contains a red circle indicating how many errors have been found in the project.

trans-unit.source: None of these errors prevents you from downloading the translated file.
trans-unit.target: None of these errors prevents you from downloading the translated file.

trans-unit.source: Click on the icon to open the segment with the error.
trans-unit.target: Click on the icon to open the segment with the error.

trans-unit.source: A message indicates the nature of the error: tag mismatch and/or translation conflict.
trans-unit.target: A message indicates the nature of the error: tag mismatch and/or translation conflict.

trans-unit.source: The tag <g id=“19”> in the source segment, indicated by the red arrow, {1>was not added to the target segment<1}.
trans-unit.target: The tag <g id=“19”> in the source segment, indicated by the red arrow, {1>was not added to the target segment<1}.

trans-unit.source: In order to fix the error, you can:
trans-unit.target: In order to fix the error, you can:

trans-unit.source: {1}copy and paste the tag from the source segment to the target and place it in the same position as in the source
trans-unit.target: {1}copy and paste the tag from the source segment to the target and place it in the same position as in the source

trans-unit.source: {1}click on the tag in the source segment and drag and drop it to the target segment
trans-unit.target: {1}click on the tag in the source segment and drag and drop it to the target segment

trans-unit.source: {1}enter the symbol < to display the list of the tags in the source text.
trans-unit.target: {1}enter the symbol < to display the list of the tags in the source text.

trans-unit.source: Select the one you need and click {2>Enter <2}to add it to your translation.
trans-unit.target: Select the one you need and click {2>Enter <2}to add it to your translation.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t fix the tag mismatch error before clicking on the Preview or Download button in the top bar of the translation editor window, the strings “UNTRANSLATED_CONTENT” will appear in the segments where the error is present in the downloaded file(s).
trans-unit.target: If you don’t fix the tag mismatch error before clicking on the Preview or Download button in the top bar of the translation editor window, the strings “UNTRANSLATED_CONTENT” will appear in the segments where the error is present in the downloaded file(s).

trans-unit.source: MateCat warns the user when {1>two or more different translations are inserted for the same source segment in the same project<1}.
trans-unit.target: MateCat warns the user when {1>two or more different translations are inserted for the same source segment in the same project<1}.

trans-unit.source: MateCat uses {2>track changes <2}to highlight the differences.
trans-unit.target: MateCat uses {2>track changes <2}to highlight the differences.

trans-unit.source: To fix this error, choose one of the suggested matches or click on the {3>View <3}button to check and correct the translations.
trans-unit.target: To fix this error, choose one of the suggested matches or click on the {3>View <3}button to check and correct the translations.

trans-unit.source: The following two types of error messages will not appear in the warning sign.
trans-unit.target: The following two types of error messages will not appear in the warning sign.

trans-unit.source: They will be displayed at the segment level only.
trans-unit.target: They will be displayed at the segment level only.

trans-unit.source: MateCat also displays a {1>warning <1}when tags are not in the {2>same position <2}as in the original segment.
trans-unit.target: MateCat also displays a {1>warning <1}when tags are not in the {2>same position <2}as in the original segment.

trans-unit.source: Tags in the wrong order will be coloured in pink.
trans-unit.target: Tags in the wrong order will be coloured in pink.

trans-unit.source: In the example above, tag <g id=”24”> in the target segment is not in the same position as in the original.
trans-unit.target: In the example above, tag <g id=”24”> in the target segment is not in the same position as in the original.

trans-unit.source: In order to fix the error, you can:
trans-unit.target: In order to fix the error, you can:

trans-unit.source: {1}click on the tag coloured in pink in the target segment and drag and drop it to the correct position in the phrase
trans-unit.target: {1}click on the tag coloured in pink in the target segment and drag and drop it to the correct position in the phrase

trans-unit.source: {1}enter the symbol < in the tag’s correct position to display the list of the tags in the source text.
trans-unit.target: {1}enter the symbol < in the tag’s correct position to display the list of the tags in the source text.

trans-unit.source: Select the one you need and click {2>Enter <2}to add it to your translation.
trans-unit.target: Select the one you need and click {2>Enter <2}to add it to your translation.

trans-unit.source: Then delete the tag in the wrong position.
trans-unit.target: Then delete the tag in the wrong position.

trans-unit.source: {1}copy and paste the tag from the source segment to the target and place it in the correct position.
trans-unit.target: {1}copy and paste the tag from the source segment to the target and place it in the correct position.

trans-unit.source: Then delete the tag in the wrong position.
trans-unit.target: Then delete the tag in the wrong position.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t fix the tag order mismatch error before clicking on the Preview or Download button in the top bar of the translation editor window, in most cases the translated document will still be created normally, but it’s possible that the original text will be displayed in the downloaded file instead of the translation.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t fix the tag order mismatch error before clicking on the Preview or Download button in the top bar of the translation editor window, in most cases the translated document will still be created normally, but it’s possible that the original text will be displayed in the downloaded file instead of the translation.

trans-unit.source: MateCat warns the user when {1>more or fewer spaces <1}{2>are found in the target segment next to tags.<2}
trans-unit.target: MateCat warns the user when {1>more or fewer spaces <1}{2>are found in the target segment next to tags.<2}

trans-unit.source: {2>In the image above, there are two extra whitespaces indicated by the red arrows.<2}
trans-unit.target: {2>In the image above, there are two extra whitespaces indicated by the red arrows.<2}

trans-unit.source: {2>To fix the error, delete the extra spaces between the tags and the word.<2}
trans-unit.target: {2>To fix the error, delete the extra spaces between the tags and the word.<2}

trans-unit.source: To enable the {1>Google Chrome spell-checker <1}for your target language, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the {1>Google Chrome spell-checker <1}for your target language, follow these steps:

trans-unit.target: 2.{j}Click on Add and add your {1>target language<1};

trans-unit.source: 3.{j}Select {1>Enable spell checking <1}{2>in the dialogue window that opens.<2}
trans-unit.target: 3.{j}Select {1>Enable spell checking <1}{2>in the dialogue window that opens.<2}

trans-unit.source: To enable {1>Safari spell-checker <1}for your target language, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable {1>Safari spell-checker <1}for your target language, follow these steps:

trans-unit.target: • {1>Go to Safari>Edit>Spelling and Grammar <1}• {2>Show spelling and Grammar<2}

trans-unit.source: • {1>Choose your language in the dropdown menu <1}• {2>Click on change<2}
trans-unit.target: • {1>Choose your language in the dropdown menu <1}• {2>Click on change<2}

trans-unit.source: You can access the Editing Log from the corresponding button at the bottom of the {1>Translation Editor<1} page.
trans-unit.target: You can access the Editing Log from the corresponding button at the bottom of the {1>Translation Editor<1} page.

trans-unit.source: The Editing Log contains {1>statistical information about the translation<1}.
trans-unit.target: The Editing Log contains {1>statistical information about the translation<1}.

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>• <2}{3>under the Summary section you can find statistical information about the entire project:<3}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>• <2}{3>under the Summary section you can find statistical information about the entire project:<3}

trans-unit.source: {1>Average number of seconds <1}you needed to translate each word
trans-unit.target: {1>Average number of seconds <1}you needed to translate each word

trans-unit.source: {1>Total time <1}necessary to complete the translation so far
trans-unit.target: {1>Total time <1}necessary to complete the translation so far

trans-unit.source: This indicates your efforts in updating machine translation suggestions
trans-unit.target: This indicates your efforts in updating machine translation suggestions

trans-unit.source: {b>% of words in too SLOW edits<b}
trans-unit.target: {b>% of words in too SLOW edits<b}

trans-unit.target: Percentage of words on which you spent {1>too much time <1}{2>editing<2}

trans-unit.source: {b>% of words in too FAST edits<b}
trans-unit.target: {b>% of words in too FAST edits<b}

trans-unit.target: Percentage of words on which you spent {1>too little time <1}{2>editing<2}

trans-unit.source: {1}Under the Editing details sections you can see all details per segment:
trans-unit.target: {1}Under the Editing details sections you can see all details per segment:

trans-unit.source: You can click on it to open the segment in the Translation Editor page.
trans-unit.target: You can click on it to open the segment in the Translation Editor page.

trans-unit.source: It is always 85% by default for Machine Translation suggestions
trans-unit.target: It is always 85% by default for Machine Translation suggestions

trans-unit.source: {1}The warning icon and orange borders indicate that you spent too much or too little time to edit the segment.
trans-unit.target: {1}The warning icon and orange borders indicate that you spent too much or too little time to edit the segment.

trans-unit.source: Once the translation is complete (100% on the progress bar), the {1>Preview <1}{2>button at the top of the page is replaced by the <2}{3>Download translation <3}button.
trans-unit.target: Once the translation is complete (100% on the progress bar), the {1>Preview <1}{2>button at the top of the page is replaced by the <2}{3>Download translation <3}button.

trans-unit.source: By clicking on the {1>Download Translation <1}{2>button, you can download the translated text in the same format as the original file.<2}
trans-unit.target: By clicking on the {1>Download Translation <1}{2>button, you can download the translated text in the same format as the original file.<2}

trans-unit.source: {2>If the project contains more than one file, all will be downloaded as compressed in a zip folder.<2}
trans-unit.target: {2>If the project contains more than one file, all will be downloaded as compressed in a zip folder.<2}

trans-unit.source: The text can be downloaded at any time during translation by clicking on the {1>Preview <1}button.
trans-unit.target: The text can be downloaded at any time during translation by clicking on the {1>Preview <1}button.

trans-unit.source: The portions of text not yet translated will be replaced by a machine translation.
trans-unit.target: The portions of text not yet translated will be replaced by a machine translation.

trans-unit.source: {1>When you create a project, you have the option of adding the project to your <1}{2>Management Panel <2}{3>by <3}{4>logging in<4} with your {5>Google account <5}before creating it.
trans-unit.target: {1>When you create a project, you have the option of adding the project to your <1}{2>Management Panel <2}{3>by <3}{4>logging in<4} with your {5>Google account <5}before creating it.

trans-unit.source: This panel shows you the list of {1>all projects created using your Google account <1}and allows you to check the progress and status of your projects or recover them if needed.
trans-unit.target: This panel shows you the list of {1>all projects created using your Google account <1}and allows you to check the progress and status of your projects or recover them if needed.

trans-unit.source: To log in with your Google account, click on the {1>Login <1}button at the bottom of the MateCat home page and sign in using your Google account.
trans-unit.target: To log in with your Google account, click on the {1>Login <1}button at the bottom of the MateCat home page and sign in using your Google account.

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>Note<2}{3>: remember to <3}{4>always log in before <4}{5>creating a project<5}{6> if you want to add it to your <6}{7>Man-agement Panel<7}{8>.<8}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>Note<2}{3>: remember to <3}{4>always log in before <4}{5>creating a project<5}{6> if you want to add it to your <6}{7>Man-agement Panel<7}{8>.<8}

trans-unit.source: {8>If you create a project <8}{9>without logging in <9}{10>with your Google account, the <10}{11>job URL <11}{12>of the project will not be saved automatically so please remember to save it manually in a safe place in order to be able to recover it easily if needed.<12}
trans-unit.target: {8>If you create a project <8}{9>without logging in <9}{10>with your Google account, the <10}{11>job URL <11}{12>of the project will not be saved automatically so please remember to save it manually in a safe place in order to be able to recover it easily if needed.<12}

trans-unit.source: • {1>Click on Manage at the bottom of the MateCat home page<1}
trans-unit.target: • {1>Click on Manage at the bottom of the MateCat home page<1}

trans-unit.source: • {1>Link to the translation jobs divided per language combination and MateCat job ID (under “Job” column) - you can access the <1}{2>Translation Editor<2}{3> window of each job by clicking on the corresponding <3}{4>job URL<4}
trans-unit.target: • {1>Link to the translation jobs divided per language combination and MateCat job ID (under “Job” column) - you can access the <1}{2>Translation Editor<2}{3> window of each job by clicking on the corresponding <3}{4>job URL<4}

trans-unit.target: • {1>Private TM Key (if any; blank column if not present)<1}

trans-unit.target: • {1>Progress bar of each translation job (under “Progress” column)<1}

trans-unit.source: • {1>A series of buttons that enable you to perform a number of tasks:<1}
trans-unit.target: • {1>A series of buttons that enable you to perform a number of tasks:<1}

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>Change job password <2}{3>– This modifies the password of the job.<3}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>Change job password <2}{3>– This modifies the password of the job.<3}

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>Cancel job/project <2}{3>– This deletes the job/project and disables the URL.<3}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>Cancel job/project <2}{3>– This deletes the job/project and disables the URL.<3}

trans-unit.target: {1}{2>Archive Job/project <2}{3>– This prevents any changes from being applied to the job/project.<3}

trans-unit.target: {3>However, the URL will still work and is accessible in r<3}{4>ead-only mode<4}{5>.<5}

trans-unit.source: By default, the management panel will show your {1>active projects <1}{2>only, in <2}{3>chronological order<3}{4>.<4}
trans-unit.target: By default, the management panel will show your {1>active projects <1}{2>only, in <2}{3>chronological order<3}{4>.<4}

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>You can filter and see the cancelled and archived projects by clicking on the <2}{3>Filter <3}{4>button<4}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>You can filter and see the cancelled and archived projects by clicking on the <2}{3>Filter <3}{4>button<4}

trans-unit.source: {4>or on “Showing active projects” at the top of the page.<4}
trans-unit.target: {4>or on “Showing active projects” at the top of the page.<4}

trans-unit.source: You can filter your search by:
trans-unit.target: You can filter your search by:

trans-unit.source: Click on the {1>FILTER <1}button to apply your criteria to the search.
trans-unit.target: Click on the {1>FILTER <1}button to apply your criteria to the search.

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>For reasons of privacy, <2}{3>your projects are automatically archived after 30 days of inactivity<3}{4>.<4}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>For reasons of privacy, <2}{3>your projects are automatically archived after 30 days of inactivity<3}{4>.<4}

trans-unit.target: {4>You will still be able to reactivate them in your Management panel or in the Management panel of the person who created the project.<4}

trans-unit.source: MateCat provides an easy-to-use split functionality {1>to divide large jobs into smaller parts and assign them to multiple translators<1}.
trans-unit.target: MateCat provides an easy-to-use split functionality {1>to divide large jobs into smaller parts and assign them to multiple translators<1}.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for large {2>collaborative projects<2}.
trans-unit.target: This is useful for large {2>collaborative projects<2}.

trans-unit.source: You can split a job from the {1>Volume Analysis page<1}.
trans-unit.target: You can split a job from the {1>Volume Analysis page<1}.

trans-unit.source: {1>After completion of the volume analysis, you can select <1}{2>how many jobs <2}you would like to create and click on the {3>Split <3}button.
trans-unit.target: {1>After completion of the volume analysis, you can select <1}{2>how many jobs <2}you would like to create and click on the {3>Split <3}button.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, we are going to create 4 jobs:
trans-unit.target: In the following example, we are going to create 4 jobs:

trans-unit.source: You will then be presented with a dialogue window where you can enter the approximate number of words for each job.
trans-unit.target: You will then be presented with a dialogue window where you can enter the approximate number of words for each job.

trans-unit.source: The word count is approximate until you click on the Check button.
trans-unit.target: The word count is approximate until you click on the Check button.

trans-unit.source: When you click on the {1>Check <1}{2>button, MateCat checks each part and divides segments into an indicative number of words, avoiding any overlap between segments.<2}
trans-unit.target: When you click on the {1>Check <1}{2>button, MateCat checks each part and divides segments into an indicative number of words, avoiding any overlap between segments.<2}

trans-unit.source: Splitting a job in 4 parts after checking the word count.
trans-unit.target: Splitting a job in 4 parts after checking the word count.

trans-unit.source: Note that the word count for each part has changed.
trans-unit.target: Note that the word count for each part has changed.

trans-unit.source: {1>When you click on <1}{2>Confirm<2}, you will be presented with a {3>detailed analysis of the split jobs <3}and a {4>Translate <4}button for each part.
trans-unit.target: {1>When you click on <1}{2>Confirm<2}, you will be presented with a {3>detailed analysis of the split jobs <3}and a {4>Translate <4}button for each part.

trans-unit.source: A job split in four parts
trans-unit.target: A job split in four parts

trans-unit.source: In the event that you make a mistake and would like to undo the splitting, just click on the {1>Merge all <1}{2>button and the different parts will be merged back into the original job.<2}
trans-unit.target: In the event that you make a mistake and would like to undo the splitting, just click on the {1>Merge all <1}{2>button and the different parts will be merged back into the original job.<2}

trans-unit.source: You just need to send each translator the {1>Job URL<1} for the part they will be working on.
trans-unit.target: You just need to send each translator the {1>Job URL<1} for the part they will be working on.

trans-unit.source: When clicking on their link, translators will only see the part of the document assigned to them as editable.
trans-unit.target: When clicking on their link, translators will only see the part of the document assigned to them as editable.

trans-unit.source: {1>They can also see the rest of the file, but they will not be able to edit it.<1}
trans-unit.target: {1>They can also see the rest of the file, but they will not be able to edit it.<1}

trans-unit.source: {2>They will see the rest of the document being translated <2}{3>in real time <3}{4>and can refer to the other parts for comparison.<4}
trans-unit.target: {2>They will see the rest of the document being translated <2}{3>in real time <3}{4>and can refer to the other parts for comparison.<4}

trans-unit.source: {1}{2>They will also <2}{3>share a <3}{4>private TM key<4}{5>, if previously associated, where all translations will be stored, so <5}{6>each translator will also receive suggestions for segments already translated by the other translators <6}{7>within the same project.<7}
trans-unit.target: {1}{2>They will also <2}{3>share a <3}{4>private TM key<4}{5>, if previously associated, where all translations will be stored, so <5}{6>each translator will also receive suggestions for segments already translated by the other translators <6}{7>within the same project.<7}

trans-unit.source: Each translation is complete once {1>all segments <1}{2>of that job have been translated and marked as translated.<2}
trans-unit.target: Each translation is complete once {1>all segments <1}{2>of that job have been translated and marked as translated.<2}

trans-unit.source: {2>The progress bar at the bottom of the screen should be blue and the To-do count should be zero.<2}
trans-unit.target: {2>The progress bar at the bottom of the screen should be blue and the To-do count should be zero.<2}

trans-unit.source: {1>The <1}{2>progress bar<2}{3>, the <3}{4>To-do count<4}{5> and the <5}{6>payable words<6}{7> count only refer to the current job<7}.
trans-unit.target: {1>The <1}{2>progress bar<2}{3>, the <3}{4>To-do count<4}{5> and the <5}{6>payable words<6}{7> count only refer to the current job<7}.

trans-unit.source: You can check the status and progress of each job from your own {8>Management Panel.<8}
trans-unit.target: You can check the status and progress of each job from your own {8>Management Panel.<8}

trans-unit.source: {9>Once all jobs are 100% complete, you can click on any of the links and click on the <9}{10>Download translation <10}button.
trans-unit.target: {9>Once all jobs are 100% complete, you can click on any of the links and click on the <9}{10>Download translation <10}button.

trans-unit.source: In this way you will download the {11>whole translated file<11}.
trans-unit.target: In this way you will download the {11>whole translated file<11}.

trans-unit.source: MateCat can help LSPs (Language Service Providers) to manage projects easily and perform all checks not only after delivery by the translator but also {1>during the translation job <1}itself.
trans-unit.target: MateCat can help LSPs (Language Service Providers) to manage projects easily and perform all checks not only after delivery by the translator but also {1>during the translation job <1}itself.

trans-unit.source: The main tools and functions available for Project Managers are the {1>Management<1} {2>Panel,<2} the {3>Editing log<3} and the {4>QA messages<4}{5> in the <5}{6>Translation Editor window<6}.
trans-unit.target: The main tools and functions available for Project Managers are the {1>Management<1} {2>Panel,<2} the {3>Editing log<3} and the {4>QA messages<4}{5> in the <5}{6>Translation Editor window<6}.

trans-unit.source: Through the Management Panel, the Project Manager can easily check {1>the status <1}{2>of all translation jobs in <2}{3>real time<3}.
trans-unit.target: Through the Management Panel, the Project Manager can easily check {1>the status <1}{2>of all translation jobs in <2}{3>real time<3}.

trans-unit.source: Here, he/she has a list of all active projects in chronological order and the progress bar for each job.
trans-unit.target: Here, he/she has a list of all active projects in chronological order and the progress bar for each job.

trans-unit.source: {1>By clicking on the job URL of a specific project, it is possible to <1}{2>check errors during the translation <2}and promptly advise the translator working on the project.
trans-unit.target: {1>By clicking on the job URL of a specific project, it is possible to <1}{2>check errors during the translation <2}and promptly advise the translator working on the project.

trans-unit.source: Through the QA module, it is possible to check if there are {3>tag errors or translation conflicts <3}during the translation, without waiting for delivery by the translator and thus save time.
trans-unit.target: Through the QA module, it is possible to check if there are {3>tag errors or translation conflicts <3}during the translation, without waiting for delivery by the translator and thus save time.

trans-unit.source: From the Translation Editor window, it is possible to access the Editing Log page by clicking on the {1>Editing Log <1}button at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: From the Translation Editor window, it is possible to access the Editing Log page by clicking on the {1>Editing Log <1}button at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: {1>In the Editing Log, the Project Manager can check the <1}{2>time <2}spent by the translator for editing each segment, the total time spent by the translator to translate the entire file and check the {3>edits <3}made to suggestions.
trans-unit.target: {1>In the Editing Log, the Project Manager can check the <1}{2>time <2}spent by the translator for editing each segment, the total time spent by the translator to translate the entire file and check the {3>edits <3}made to suggestions.

trans-unit.source: The changes are highlighted with track changes.
trans-unit.target: The changes are highlighted with track changes.

trans-unit.source: This can help the Project Manager identify the Post-Editing efforts of the translator to edit the segments.
trans-unit.target: This can help the Project Manager identify the Post-Editing efforts of the translator to edit the segments.

trans-unit.source: MateCat relies heavily on {1>keyboard shortcuts <1}for standard and advanced functionalities.
trans-unit.target: MateCat relies heavily on {1>keyboard shortcuts <1}for standard and advanced functionalities.

trans-unit.source: Getting to know the shortcuts below will help you be more productive when translating in MateCat.
trans-unit.target: Getting to know the shortcuts below will help you be more productive when translating in MateCat.

trans-unit.source: Confirm translation and go to next untranslated segment (click on [T+>>])
trans-unit.target: Confirm translation and go to next untranslated segment (click on [T+>>])

trans-unit.source: Undo in segment (available in active segment)
trans-unit.target: Undo in segment (available in active segment)

trans-unit.source: Redo in segment (available in active segment)
trans-unit.target: Redo in segment (available in active segment)

trans-unit.source: Go to beginning of the line
trans-unit.target: Go to beginning of the line

trans-unit.source: Go to end of the line
trans-unit.target: Go to end of the line

trans-unit.source: Move the cursor word by word to the right
trans-unit.target: Move the cursor word by word to the right

trans-unit.source: Move the cursor word by word to the left
trans-unit.target: Move the cursor word by word to the left

trans-unit.source: Perform Concordance search on word(s) selected in the source or target segment
trans-unit.target: Perform Concordance search on word(s) selected in the source or target segment

trans-unit.source: Add a new line in the target segment
trans-unit.target: Add a new line in the target segment

trans-unit.source: Installing an open source version of MateCat
trans-unit.target: Installing an open source version of MateCat

trans-unit.source: We provide a guide meant for users who want to install and administer the open source version on their own machines.
trans-unit.target: We provide a guide meant for users who want to install and administer the open source version on their own machines.
